faq.title: How to start to learn marketing online?
content: Online marketing includes many smaller domains like managing social media, creating ad campaigns on Facebook, copywriting, or building sales funnels. Not to drown in all that information, choose one topic to start with. Once you feel comfortable, you can move to the next subject. When you get an overview of most online marketing activities, it will be way easier to absorb particular skills and learn marketing tools for specific tasks.

faq.title: Where can I find marketing classes online?
content: Browse actionable courses in marketing on Grinfer. Learn hands-on skills in digital marketing, ASO, branding, SMM, e-commerce, and more. Taught by experts, all courses are created to take your marketing skills to the next level.
